00052 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00053   typedef Cons<RangeServerClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> AppPolicy;
00054 
00055   try {
00056     init_with_policy<AppPolicy>(argc, argv);
00057 
00058     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00059     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00060     InetAddr addr(get_str("rs-host"), get_i16("rs-port"));
00061     int timeout = get_i32("timeout");
00062 
00063     conn_mgr->add(addr, timeout, "Range Server");
00064 
00065     if (!conn_mgr->wait_for_connection(addr, timeout))
00066       HT_THROWF(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to range server %s",
00067                 addr.format().c_str());
00068 
00069     RangeServerClient *client = new RangeServerClient(comm, timeout);
00070 
00071     client->dump_stats(addr);
00072   }
00073   catch (Exception &e) {
00074     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00075     return 1;
00076   }
00077   return 0;
00078 }
